doc:
Michael Aldridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Aldridge 0 Michael William ffolliott Aldridge (9 September 1920 – 10 January 1994) was an English actor. He was known for playing Seymour in the television series Last of the Summer Wine from 1986 to 1990 and he had a long career as a character actor on stage and screen dating back to the 1930s. Michael_William_ffolliott_Aldridge ( 9_September_1920 – 10_January_1994 ) was an_English_actor . He was_known for playing Seymour in the_television_series_Last of the_Summer_Wine from 1986 to 1990 and he had a_long_career as a_character_actor on stage_and_screen dating back to the_1930s .
